definition: to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
lane (usually as part of a street name)/memorial archway

sentences.english: French moulin rouge, freed wine unrestrained dance.
sentences.chinese: 法国红磨坊，酒酣舞狂放。

sentences.english: Well, I guess I should've known. He just kept making me watch Moulin Rouge.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我早就该猜到了他总是强迫我看《红磨坊》。

sentences.english: The Industrial Revolution began with such machines; the millwrights were the engineers of the coming age.
sentences.chinese: 修造磨坊的匠人就是开创新时代的工程师。

sentences.english: We watched the logs floating towards the mill.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着木头朝磨坊漂去。

sentences.english: Once the flow of water stops or even slows down, the water mill, that is the economy, will stop moving.
sentences.chinese: 一旦水流减慢或停止，水磨坊，即经济将停止运转。

sentences.english: Once upon a time there was a miller. He lived contentedly with his wife.
sentences.chinese: 从前，有位磨坊主和妻子生活在一块，生活十分富足。

sentences.english: Mills used to depend on wind power or water power.
sentences.chinese: 磨坊过去依赖风力或水力操作。

sentences.english: Cornille had returned to the mill before the villagers arrived.
sentences.chinese: 在村民来到磨坊前柯奈尔早就回来了。

sentences.english: Every miller draws water to his own mill.
sentences.chinese: 磨坊主都往自己磨里注水。

sentences.english: The underground mills of Col-des-Roches are unusual.
sentences.chinese: 罗氏山口的地下磨坊是很不寻常的景观。

sentences.english: A wind mill from the same village.
sentences.chinese: 风力磨坊来自同一个村庄。

sentences.english: One day, a colt took a bag of wheat to the mill.
sentences.chinese: 一天，小马驮着麦子去磨坊。

sentences.english: I doubt if Flying Childers ever carried a peck of corn to mill.
sentences.chinese: 我怀疑飞童有没有载过一粒谷子到磨坊去。

sentences.english: The never-failing brook, the busy mill.
sentences.chinese: 永不干涸的溪流，繁忙的磨坊。

sentences.english: See, this is the landmark of Moulin Rough.
sentences.chinese: 看，这就是红磨坊的地标。

sentences.english: As soon as winter was over and the primroses began to bloom, the Miller went to visit little Hans.
sentences.chinese: 冬天一过，樱草花刚一开，磨坊主就去看望小汉斯了。
